title: How to Refill a 5 Gallon Water Dispenser

steps.title: Remove the foam seal from the cap if there is one.
steps.content: Remove the foam seal from the cap if there is one. Note that Ciel bottle caps have a left-hand thread, so turn right (clockwise) to loosen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Cut a hole in the cap about half the diameter.
steps.content: Cut a hole in the cap about half the diameter. You can use a drill or a knife.

steps.title: Replace the foam, and screw on the modified lid.
steps.content: Replace the foam, and screw on the modified lid.

steps.title: Invert the bottle onto the dispenser.
steps.content: Invert the bottle onto the dispenser. The water pressure against the foam cap will keep all but maybe a slight dribble from leaking. [2] X Research source

steps.title: The center protrusion will force the seal out, releasing the water.
steps.content: The center protrusion will force the seal out, releasing the water. The foam seal will then float to the top.
